member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Client.TeamProjectDeleter.m_useLegacyMode
member.summary: If true, default to the old deletion workflow using CSS even when the server supports the operations REST endpoint (TFS 2015 RC or later).

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Client.TeamProjectDeleter.m_useNewDeleteWorkflow
member.summary: If true, use the operations REST endpoint (supported on TFS 2015 RC or later) to delete the project. Prefer the new delete workflow using this endpoint over the old workflow using CSS.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Client.TeamProjectDeleter.HasWssToDelete
member.summary: Indicates whether the project has a WSS site to delete.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Client.TeamProjectDeleter.ExcludeWss
member.summary: Indicates that the WSS site should not be deleted.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Client.TeamProjectDeleter.Initialize
member.summary: Initialize the project information, proxies, and catalog info. Determine whether to use old or new delete workflow.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Client.TeamProjectDeleter.Delete
member.summary: Attempts to delete the team project. Throws an exception if it cannot. If the 'force' parameter is set in the constructor, will not throw exceptions if it cannot delete any one part of the project, but will continue trying to delete individual components.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Client.TeamProjectDeleter.DetachWssSite
member.summary: Detaches the WSS site from TFS.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Client.TeamProjectDeleter.DoServiceDelete(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Calls the delete method on the specified service for the specified project.
member.param: Localized string describing the entry type to delete (e.g., "Version Control").

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Client.TeamProjectDeleter.ReportSiteExists
member.summary: Checks for the existence of the report folder.
member.returns: true if the report folder exists, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Client.TeamProjectDeleter.InitializeWss
member.summary: Initializes the WSS Admin proxy and ensures that either the service is unavailable or that the service is present and we can access it.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Client.TeamProjectDeleter.InitializeRosetta
member.summary: Initializes the Rosetta proxy and ensures that either the service is unavailable or that the service is present and we can access it.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Client.TeamProjectDeleter.GetLocalizedDeleteOperationStatus(Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.Operations.OperationStatus)
member.summary: Maps a delete operation's status to a localized string for logging to the console.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Client.TeamProjectDeleter.OnOperationStatus(Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.Operations.OperationStatus)
member.summary: Logs a localized string to update the user on the status of an operation. Will not log an unrecognized status.
member.param: The status to which the operation has just changed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Client.TeamProjectDeleter.GetLocalizedEntryTypeName(System.String)
member.summary: Maps an entry typename to a localized string for logging to the console.
